recipes.label: Get a Commission from Dr. Harris
recipes.startdescription: Dr Harris works on secret projects in the hours after dark. Noone is privy to what he is doing, but he asks for assistance often. Now, he seeks mine.

recipes.label: Fulfill a Commission for Dr. Harris
recipes.description: I've increased my favour with Dr. Harris, the lawyer. Perhaps in time I will reap the dividends of this friendship.

recipes.label: A Commission?
recipes.startdescription: Good day. Is the commission going to be long yet?

recipes.label: Call on a small favour from Dr Harris, the laywer.
recipes.startdescription: Trouble with the Bureau? I'll call one of my barristers.

recipes.label: Call on a large favour from Dr. Harris, the lawyer.
recipes.startdescription: Perhaps we can do something about your reputation.
recipes.description: My employees can take care of it.

recipes.label: Call on a substantial favour from the kindly Professor.
recipes.startdescription: I may be able to secure the personal documents your... Foes collected about you.
recipes.description: The deed is done. Just say the word.

recipes.label: Use a lawsuit to repair my reputation.
recipes.startdescription: Dr. Harris' associate has issued several cease and desist notices on publications printing stories about me.
recipes.description: My name should be somewhat clearer now.

recipes.label: Use a lawsuit to destroy evidence.
recipes.startdescription: Dr. Harris' associate has written up a formal request for handing over documents relating to my activities.
recipes.description: The documents were begrudgingly surrendered to me. I burned them at the first opportunity.
